ECEnumerator.name: LeftBottom
ECEnumerator.description: Most bottom left Profile's bounding box point.

ECEnumerator.name: MiddleBottom
ECEnumerator.description: Most bottom center profile BoundingBox point.

ECEnumerator.name: RightBottom
ECEnumerator.description: Most bottom right Profile BoundingBox point.

ECEnumerator.name: LeftMiddle
ECEnumerator.description: Most left point at the horizontal middle height line of Profile BoundingBox.

ECEnumerator.name: MiddleMiddle
ECEnumerator.description: Profile's BoundingBox center point.

ECEnumerator.name: RightMiddle
ECEnumerator.description: Most right point at the horizontal middle height line of Profile BoundingBox.

ECEnumerator.name: LeftTop
ECEnumerator.description: Most top left profile BoundingBox point.

ECEnumerator.name: MiddleTop
ECEnumerator.description: Most top center profile BoundingBox point.

ECEnumerator.name: RightTop
ECEnumerator.description: Most top right profile BoundingBox point.

ECEnumerator.name: Centroid
ECEnumerator.description: Point at which a cutout of the shape could be perfectly balanced.

ECEnumerator.name: CentroidBottom
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most bottom horizontal line, most close to GeometricCentroid.

ECEnumerator.name: LeftCentroid
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most left vertical line, most close to GeometricCentroid.

ECEnumerator.name: RightCentroid
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most right vertical line, most close to GeometricCentroid.

ECEnumerator.name: CentroidTop
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most top horizontal line, most close to GeometricCentroid.

ECEnumerator.name: ShearCenter
ECEnumerator.description: Point at which applied external force does not twist Profile.

ECEnumerator.name: ShearBottom
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most bottom horizontal line, most close to ShearCentre.

ECEnumerator.name: LeftShear
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most left vertical line, most close to ShearCentre.

ECEnumerator.name: RightShear
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most right vertical line, most close to ShearCentre.

ECEnumerator.name: ShearTop
ECEnumerator.description: Point on the most top horizontal line, most close to ShearCentre.

ECEnumeration.description: Used for setting classification for CurveMember.

ECEnumerator.name: Unset
ECEnumerator.description: Classification undefined.

ECEnumerator.name: Beam
ECEnumerator.description: Structural element that primarily resists loads applied laterally to the beam's length.

ECEnumerator.name: Column
ECEnumerator.description: Structural element that primarily resists load applied along the beam's length.

ECEnumerator.name: HorizontalBrace
ECEnumerator.description: Structural system commonly used in structures subject to lateral loads such as wind and seismic pressure. The bracing at each floor (in horizontal planes) provides load paths for the transference of horizontal forces to the planes of vertical bracing.

ECEnumerator.name: StripFooting
ECEnumerator.description: Structural element that provides a continuous, level (or sometimes stepped) strip of base to a wall or closely-spaced rows of columns built centrally above them.

ECEnumerator.name: Pedestal
ECEnumerator.description: Base on which a column is mounted.

ECEnumerator.name: Pile
ECEnumerator.description: Vertical structural element of a deep foundation, driven or drilled deep into the ground at the building site.

ECEnumerator.name: VerticalBrace
ECEnumerator.description: Structural system commonly used in structures subject to lateral loads such as wind and seismic pressure. Bracing between column lines (in vertical planes) provides load paths for the transference of horizontal forces to ground level.

ECEnumeration.description: Used for setting classification for SurfaceMember.

ECEnumerator.name: Top
ECEnumerator.description: Topology defines top boundary of a Surface.

ECEnumerator.name: Middle
ECEnumerator.description: Topology defines boundary at the mid depth of a Surface.

ECEnumerator.name: Bottom
ECEnumerator.description: Topology defines boundary at the bottom of a Surface.

ECEntityClass.description: Model containing all StructuralAnalysis elements.
StructuralAnalysisPartition element indicates that there is a specialized StructuralAnalysis perspective within the overall information hierarchy.
Used to store an entire structure.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Default location for definition elements. (Optional)

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a Structure refers to a Definition Set.

ECEntityClass.description: Abstract class for all topology-related classes to derive from.

Abstract topology class that can be shared by multiple other Elements. Sharing defines connectivity of the topological network. Each subclass is also the lowest level concept for a particular dimensionality (Face is the lowest 2D concept).

Abstract class as a common parent class for each topology type that is not shared. Each subclass represents a direct or indirect collection of the shared topology. Each subclass is also a collection of the topology of the same dimensionality.
An identified location in 3D space.

ECProperty.description: Describes Vertex location. Point is only set on Vertex creation and cannot be modified.

ECEntityClass.description: A surface bounded by Loops.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a Face owns a Loop which describes it's outer boundary.
A relationship that indicates that a Face owns a Path which should describe it's inner connectivity with other StructuralAnalysis Elements.

ECEntityClass.description: This Aspect stores the Faces (and related data) for a FaceSet.

ECProperty.description: Shows if direction matches Face direction.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Face described by this Aspect.

ECEntityClass.description: A set of Edge-connected Faces with compatible orientations.
A FaceSet that may be open or closed, and does not bound a Region (future concept). Sheets are also constrained to have a single base Surface.
Element which uses child Sheet do represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Sheet.

ECEntityClass.description: Series of Edges that define a continuous analytical curve.
Element which uses child Paths to represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Paths.

ECEntityClass.description: A Path that is closed and defines a boundary of a Face.
Element which uses child Loop to represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Loop.

ECEntityClass.description: A Path that does not need to be closed and is not defining the boundary of a face.
Element which uses child Wire do represent it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Wire.

ECEntityClass.description: An identified curve location in 3D space.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Start Vertex (Point).
End Vertex (Point).

ECProperty.description: A non self-intersecting curve defining Edge's location.

ECEntityClass.description: This Aspect stores Edges (and related data) for a Path.

ECProperty.description: Zero based index for Edge order in Path.
Shows if direction matches edge direction.

ECEnumeration.description: Describes the structural behavior of element to transverse loads.

ECEnumerator.name: Unset
ECEnumerator.description: To indicate this value was never set.

ECEnumerator.name: OneWay
ECEnumerator.description: This member can span transverse loads in one direction (along the region r-axis).

ECEnumerator.name: TwoWay
ECEnumerator.description: This member can span transverse loads in two (perpendicular) directions (the r- and s- axes).

ECEnumerator.name: TwoWayTwistFree
ECEnumerator.description: This member can span transverse loads in two (perpendicular) directions (the r- and s- axes), but cannot resist (r-s) twisting moments.

ECEnumeration.description: Classifies members according to the types of loads they can resist.

ECEnumerator.name: Unset
ECEnumerator.description: Value is not set.

ECEnumerator.name: GravityOnly
ECEnumerator.description: Resists only gravity loads.

ECEnumerator.name: GravityAndLateral
ECEnumerator.description: Resists both gravity and lateral loads.

ECEnumerator.name: LateralOnly
ECEnumerator.description: Resists only lateral loads.

ECEnumerator.name: NonStructural
ECEnumerator.description: Not used to resist loads.

ECEnumeration.description: Describe the structural behavior of element subject to axial loads.

ECEnumerator.name: Unset
ECEnumerator.description: Value is not set.

ECEnumerator.name: CompressionAndTension
ECEnumerator.description: Resits both Compression and tension.

ECEnumerator.name: CompressionOnly
ECEnumerator.description: Resists axial compression, but not axial tension.

ECEnumerator.name: TensionOnly
ECEnumerator.description: Resists axial tension, but not axial compression.

ECEntityClass.description: Structural behavior for a Member.
Structural behavior for a Surface Member.
Assigns analytical behavior for SurfaceMember when subjected to transverse loads.

ECProperty.description: Provides value for the behavior.

ECEntityClass.description: Member load resistance.

ECProperty.description: Value for load resistance.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines unique behavior for a specific CurveMember.
Provides camber behavior for CurveMember.

ECProperty.description: Camber value for the behavior.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines member as having a particular axial structural behavior.

ECProperty.description: Specifies axial behavior type.

ECEntityClass.description: Stiffness behavior for curve member.

ECProperty.description: Stiffness along local RAxis.
Stiffness along local SAxis.
Stiffness along local TAxis.
Stiffness about local RAxis.
Stiffness about local SAxis.
Stiffness about local TAxis.

ECEnumeration.description: Used for specifying the type of Release.

ECEntityClass.description: Release of a Member.
Vertex Release of a Member.
Path Release of a Member.
Sheet Release of a Member.
Vertex Release of a Member.

ECProperty.description: Release for Translational R Axis.
Release for Translational S Axis.
Release for Translational T Axis.
Release for Rotational R Axis.
Release for Rotational S Axis.
Release for Rotational T Axis.

ECEntityClass.description: Path Release of a Member.

ECProperty.description: Release for Translational R Axis.
Release for Translational S Axis.
Release for Translational T Axis.
Release for Rotational R Axis.

ECEntityClass.description: Sheet Release of a Member.

ECProperty.description: Release for Translational R Axis.
Release for Translational S Axis.
Release for Translational T Axis.

ECEntityClass.description: Abstract class for all StructuralAnalysisElement classes to descend from.
Abstract class for all support classes to descend from.
Support which is located at a single point.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Vertex at which this instance supports.
Point Support Behavior.

ECProperty.description: RAxis of local coordinate system.
SAxis of local coordinate system.

ECEntityClass.description: Support which is located in a curve.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Defines how support behaves at it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a CurveSupport owns a Wire which should describe it's Location.

ECEntityClass.description: Support which is located in a surface.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Defines how support behaves at it's location.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a SurfaceSupport owns a Sheet which should describe it's Location.

ECEntityClass.description: Abstract class for all member classes to descend from.
Element which is a surface.

ECProperty.description: Sheet defines area location for ISurface, the height of ISurface is defined by thickness(provided by related SurfaceType) which extrudes location area by that thickness. PlacementSurface allows to define how location area should be interpreted for extrusion - ether as start, end or center. These are the most common used cases. More flexibility is achieved by using Offset property.

PlacementSurface provides only a few cases for how to interpret the location area (Sheet). Offset provides more flexibility for less common cases, where it provides additional offset along the normal of ISurface. Both PlacementSurface and Offset properties can be used at the same time.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a Surface Type for ISurface.
Simple Surface Type.

ECProperty.description: Thickness of ISurfaces.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Material of all ISurfaces with this type.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a Member that is located by a Sheet.

ECProperty.description: The use case for this Surface Member.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a SurfaceMember owns a Sheet.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a region of a SurfaceMember that has different behavior (or is an opening).

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that a SurfaceMemberRegion owns a Sheet.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a solid region of a SurfaceMember that has different behavior.

ECProperty.description: Defines priority of SurfaceMemberModifier. Higher the number - higher the priority.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a void region of a SurfaceMember.
Defines a Member that is located along a Path, and whose behavior is defined along that Path.

ECProperty.description: Point at which Curve Member's topology intersects with Profile.
The use case for this Curve Member.

Defines the length of Rigid Zone at the start of Curve Member. Rigid zone specifies that the Curve Member is immune deformation at that zone. Common case would be where curve member overlaps with other member, overlapping area would be define das rigid zone.

Defines the length of Rigid Zone at the end of Curve Member. Rigid zone specifies that the Curve Member is immune deformation at that zone. Common case would be where curve member overlaps with other member, overlapping area would be define das rigid zone.
2d offset defined in local coordinate system, where first coordinate variable shows offset along bi-normal and second along Orientation.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that indicates that an Element owns Wire.

ECEntityClass.description: Type grouping Curve Members.
Curve Member Type with shared Material and Profile.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Material Profile.

ECEntityClass.description: Base class defining an element that pairs Profiles and PhysicalMaterials.

ECProperty.description: Name of the MaterialProfile used for identification.
Description of the MaterialProfile.

ECEntityClass.description: Single pair of Profile and PhysicalMaterial.

ECProperty.description: Index used by MaterialProfileSet to ensure a string ordering of the MaterialProfiles.
Role of the MaterialProfile.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Referenced PhysicalMaterial.
Referenced Profile.

ECEnumerator.name: Global
ECEnumerator.description: Load is defined in global coordinate system.

ECEnumerator.name: Local
ECEnumerator.description: Load is defined in host's local coordinate system.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Load applied to a relative location
ECEntityClass.description: Load which affects analysis members.

ECProperty.description: Local coordinate system of the Load.

ECEntityClass.description: Load which is applied at a point.
Load which is applied along the curve.
A Load that is applied over a surface.
Abstract class to define a relative location.
Point relative to other elements.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to point location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to point.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to curve location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to curve.

ECProperty.description: Fractional parameter (0.0 - 1.0) on a curve defining a point.
Offset in a plane defined by normal and bi-normal of location curve.

Placement Point on a Host where load is located. Should only be used with host that have a non point profile (CurveMember). This property should be set to null for hosts that do not have a 'real world' profile - CurveSupport.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Point relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Point relative to surface.

ECProperty.description: Location is defined in 2d coordinate system defined by host r and s axis.
Defines a Alignment on Surface Host for this load. For 0-thickness hosts (SurfaceSupport) this should be set to null.

ECEntityClass.description: Curve relative to other elements.
Defines location for curve load in host curve.

ECProperty.description: Fractional parameter on a host curve ('0.0' - start of the curve, 1.0 - end).
Fractional parameter on a host curve. ('0.0' - start of the curve, 1.0 - end)
Offset in a plane, defined by a host curve's normal and bi-normal.

Placement point on a profile that is associated with the host curve. PlacementPoint should be only used with host that have non point profile (CurveMember). This property should be set to null for hosts that do not have a 'real world' profile - CurveSupport

ECNavigationProperty.description: Reference/Host curve in which curve load is located.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Curve relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Curve relative to surface.

ECProperty.description: Curve which describes load location on a host surface.
Distance from the surface, along the normal. Can be both positive and negative.
Placement Surface at which load is applied. For 0-thickness hosts (SurfaceSupport) this should be set to null.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Host surface in which Curve Load is located.

ECEntityClass.description: Surface relative to other elements.

ECEntityClass.displayLabel: Surface relative to surface location data
ECEntityClass.description: Surface relative to surface.

ECProperty.description: Placement Surface at which load is applied. For 0-thickness hosts (SurfaceSupport) this should be set to null.

ECEntityClass.description: An Element that directly or indirectly defines a point in 3D space.

An Element that directly or indirectly defines a curve location and a clear coordinate system with the z-axis along the curve. The Element may have cardinal points defined; if not all the cardinal points should be considered to lie on the z-axis.

ECProperty.description: Orientation (normal) vector of the curve.

ECEntityClass.description: An Element that directly or indirectly defines a surface location and a clear coordinate system with the x and y axes in the surface. The Element may have a top, bottom and center defined; if not, the top and bottom and center should be considered to lie on the surface.

ECProperty.description: Point on the surface defining the start of its local coordinate system.
First vector defining the local coordinate system. This vector should be from tangent plane at the origin point of the surface.

ECEnumeration.description: Used for specifying LoadType in LoadContainer.

ECEnumerator.name: Unset
ECEnumerator.description: Load type not set.

ECEnumerator.name: Other
ECEnumerator.description: Load type is not specified by other available types.

ECEnumerator.name: Blast
ECEnumerator.description: Blast wave forces due to explosions.

ECEnumerator.name: DeadUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Load which does not change over time and its' source

ECEnumerator.name: DeadStructure
ECEnumerator.description: Dead load from structure self-weight.

ECEnumerator.name: DeadSuperimposed
ECEnumerator.description: Dead load from other-than structure self-weight.

ECEnumerator.name: DeadConstruction
ECEnumerator.description: Dead load from other-than-structure in place only during construction.

ECEnumerator.name: EarthPressureUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Earth pressure at some unspecified design level.

ECEnumerator.name: EarthPressureService
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to earth pressure at service limit level.

ECEnumerator.name: EarthPressureUltimate
ECEnumerator.description: Load caused by lateral pressure of soil, usually affecting a retaining wall.

ECEnumerator.name: Equipment
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to earth pressure at ultimate limit level.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads with out further specification.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorConstruction
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads in place only during construction.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorResidential
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to residential use.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorOffice
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to office use.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorAssembly
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to assembly use.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorStorage
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to storage use.

ECEnumerator.name: FloorRetail
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to retail/shopping use.

ECEnumerator.name: FluidUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to fluids, but not further specified.

ECEnumerator.name: FluidContained
ECEnumerator.description: Fluid (of known density) contained by walls of known height (such as a water or oil tank).

ECEnumerator.name: FluidUncontained
ECEnumerator.description: Fluid of unknown density or of unknown height (such as a hydrostatic flood).

ECEnumerator.name: GroundWaterPressure
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to ground water pressure.

ECEnumerator.name: Hydrodynamic
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to moving fluids.

ECEnumerator.name: Hydrostatic
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to hydrostatic pressure.

ECEnumerator.name: Ice
ECEnumerator.description: Atmospheric Ice (rain freezing upon structure, etc.)

ECEnumerator.name: MechanicalVibration
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to oscillating or rotating equipment.

ECEnumerator.name: Notional
ECEnumerator.description: Lateral loads due to vertical loads that account for the effects of initial imperfections.

ECEnumerator.name: ParkingUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to parking use.

ECEnumerator.name: ParkingLight
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to light vehicle parking use.

ECEnumerator.name: ParkingHeavy
ECEnumerator.description: Floor loads due to heavy vehicle parking use.

ECEnumerator.name: PostTensioning
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to application of post-tensioning.

ECEnumerator.name: PostTensioningRestraint
ECEnumerator.description: Theoretical loads due to restraint of post-tensioning.

ECEnumerator.name: Hyperstatic
ECEnumerator.description: Theoretical loads due to restraint of post-tensioning.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads without further specification.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofAccess
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads due to roof inspection, repair etc.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofRain
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads due to rainwater ponding.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofSnowUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads due to snow with no further specification.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofSnowUniform
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads due to uniform snow loads. Note that this is typically used as an alternate to RoofSnowDrift.

ECEnumerator.name: RoofSnowDrift
ECEnumerator.description: Roof loads due to drifted snow loads Note that this is typically used as an alternate to RoofSnowUniform.

ECEnumerator.name: SeismicUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Seismic loads at some unspecified loading level.

ECEnumerator.name: SeismicService
ECEnumerator.description: Seismic loads at service levels.

ECEnumerator.name: SeismicUltimate
ECEnumerator.description: Seismic loads at service levels.

ECEnumerator.name: Settlement
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to support settlement.

ECEnumerator.name: Shrinkage
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to member shrinkage.

ECEnumerator.name: Thermal
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to changing temperature or temperature differential.

ECEnumerator.name: TimeHistory
ECEnumerator.description: Loads due to the non-linear application of forces over time.

ECEnumerator.name: WindUnspecified
ECEnumerator.description: Wind loads at some unspecified design level.

ECEnumerator.name: WindService
ECEnumerator.description: Wind loads at service levels.

ECEnumerator.name: WindUltimate
ECEnumerator.description: Wind loads at ultimate levels.

ECEnumeration.description: Specifies the method for combining loads into a single group.

ECEnumerator.name: ABS
ECEnumerator.description: Absolute Method.

ECEnumerator.name: SRSS
ECEnumerator.description: Square Root of the Sum of the Squares Method.

ECEntityClass.description: A collection of loads.

ECProperty.description: Load Type.
Self Weight Vector.

ECEntityClass.description: Collection of loads only for grouping purposes.
Collection of loads that act over the structure as a case.
Combination of LoadConditions.
Adds a factor to a specified LoadGroup.

ECProperty.description: Factor to be applied to the group.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Load Group.

ECEntityClass.description: Adds a factor to a specified LoadCondition.

ECProperty.description: Factor to be applied to the group.
Type of load combination.

ECEntityClass.description: Adds a factor to a specified LoadCase.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Load Case.

ECEntityClass.description: Adds a factor to a specified LoadCase.

ECNavigationProperty.description: Load Combination.

ECEnumeration.description: Enumeration of Curve Load Variation types.

ECEnumerator.description: Forces at curve points vary linearly along the host curve.

ECEnumerator.name: Parabola
ECEnumerator.description: Forces at point vary parabolically along the host curve.

ECEnumerator.name: Plane

ECEnumerator.name: Parabola
ECEnumerator.description: Force at plane points vary parabolically from some specific point in the plane.

Moment per unit area about Z axis.
